title: The Passion of Chelsea Manning - DeCis
description:
I saw stormingtheivory on Tumblr screaming into the void about how shitty and transmisogynistic it is that a book about Chelsea Manning would be published while deadnaming her the entire time. The point was that it would take like, 5 minutes to even just do a find+replace to get Chelsea's name in there.

So I did.

I decided that it would be better to misgender a bunch a cis dudes than a trans woman, so I also did a find+replace on he, him, and his.

I can't promise I got anything, and the source material is bound to be disturbing in parts. I'm also not a graphic designer, so the back cover might have some missed pronouns because I didn't care to do a cut/paste on it.

Original file sourced on BookZZ.org

rip in peace
